name: Conwaywest
body:
### Conway thing
![Screenshot](https://github.com/downloads/mcdenhoed/ConwayWest/thing.png)

On a whim, coded up a quick Conway's Game of Life simulation. Still a little buggy, doesn't loop right.

I'm going to add some more features and polish later. Should be fun.

# Thanks to...
Christian Mann (@christian-mann) for taking an interest and contributing some stuff.
tagline: Created for my own amusement. A simple conway's game of life thing that let's you paint. Pygame, again.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
